Dating: MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before); NEW KINGDOM (not after)
Name: Fragment of right foot of colossal statue
Description: Front part of the right foot of a colossal statue. The break runs across the middle of the instep and along the join with the left foot.This foot belonged to a statue that, excluding base and crown, would have been almost 20 metres high if standing and 13 if seated. The provenance is not entirely clear.
